nodes.text: An Imperial tax stamp was, presumably, a kind of adhesive paper mark certifying payment of certain taxes in the Galactic Empire. At the time of the bombardment of Dankayo, the audience chamber of Squib king Ebareebaveebeedee on his momship Thrifty was decorated with an enormous mural made of multihued tax stamps. The stamps bore the warning "Do Not Remove Under Penalty of Death".
